head.title: Nationa Briefing | West: California: Los Angeles Mayor And Wife To Separate

hedline.hl1: Nationa Briefing | West: California: Los Angeles Mayor And Wife To Separate
hedline.hl2: California: Los Angeles Mayor and Wife to Separate

abstract.p: Mayor Antonio R Villaraigosa of Los Angeles and his wife of 20 years, Corina, are separating (S)

block.p: Mayor Antonio R. Villaraigosa of Los Angles announced that he and his wife of 20 years, Corina Villaraigosa, would separate. ''Each of us loves our children more than anything in the world,'' Mr. Villaraigosa said in a statement. ''And we are committed to working together for their benefit.'' The mayor and his wife, a teacher, have two teenage children. Rumors about the Villaraigosas marriage have been swirling for months; the two were rarely seen together, and Mr. Villaraigosa was spotted without his wedding ring, which he attributed to weight loss, denying his marriage was ending.
